text: It looks like the snooze button is slightly different for multiple children. should I get those from trent?
hmm, can you confirm with matt that it should be different?
if yes, then yes let's get that from trent
we're sticking with the current one
cool thanks
hey <@U026PLK4S> what's the font for "For Emma Grace" on the teaser screen? I don't have any italics in the app yet. Could you send it to me?
yep. one sec
medium italic
thank you
Should the action bar always say Our Progress even if you only have one child? Or does it show the first child's nickname until you add another child?
On tha Badge Hub? It should always say Our Progress
(Our is meant to indicate Parent+Child, not multiple children)
the badge hub already says Our Progress, but in the current app, the child's nickname is displayed on the right side of the action bar (where you tap to get into the badge hub)
^ for everyone else we figured this out. like the settings drawer the action bar will say the child's name if it is singular and "My Children" if there are multiple kids in the system
The typeface for Brainy Background looks weird when it's placed next to one of the circular widgets on special vroom types.
A file was shared
That is weird.
The font weight & size is different for the circular widgets and the new brainy button. Abby is taking it to Matt for his thoughts.
verdict is to match the "start the countdown" type so those labels are the same size and weight, and also match the labels on the completed detail view

[Vroom/develop] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/vroom/commits/3f380b0dc53355fb2e593dde60af03e1cb1304fa|3f380b0dc533>: Fixed Brainy label font to match other buttons, and correct labels for multiple children in action bar and settings drawer.
 - Marissa Anderson

Should we add Spanish translations for the new strings?
If you want to add placeholders for the spanish strings, that'd be cool, but I can go through and do it all at the end, so don't worry about it if you haven't done it so far
OK, I'll leave it alone for now.
